snippet: To the Editor:    Your March 31 news article on the overuse of the ballot and referendum in California says that ''politicians of both parties agree that the situation is out of hand.''     The reality is quite different.    Californians have used...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Your March 31 news article on the overuse of the ballot and referendum in California says that ''politicians of both parties agree that the situation is out of hand.'' The reality is quite different. Californians have used the initiative and referendum wisely. From 1912 to 1992, 236 issues were certified for the ballot.
abstract: Marta Hummel letter rejects notion that California has not used initiative and referendum wisely (S)
